awarness.title: Recycle For a Better Futute
awarness.why_recycle_content: Recycling helps conserve resources, reduce pollution, and protect the environment. It also minimizes the amount of waste sent to landfills and incinerators, preserving our planet for future generations.
awarness.how_u_help_2: - Educate others about the importance of recycling.
awarness.how_u_help_3: - Support companies that use recycled materials.
awarness.how_u_help_4: - Reduce, reuse, and recycle every day.
awarness.did_u_know_content: Recycling one ton of paper can save 17 trees and 7,000 gallons of water. Small steps can lead to big changes!
